Advertised Annual Percentage Rate (APR) is effective as of 5/6/2016 at 10:01 AM but keep in mind that rates are subject to change without notice. Rates shown are for a 30-day lock period. Unless otherwise indicated, rates apply for loan amounts from $100,000 to $417,000 for a primary residence or second home in VA or NC. Other loan programs, terms and rates may be available.

 
 

Capital Center, L.L.C. d/b/a CapCenter is both a licensed mortgage lender in Virginia and North Carolina, NMLS ID#67717 (www.nmlsconsumeraccess.org) and a licensed real estate broker in Virginia. Our primary office is located in Glen Allen, Virginia.
